title: A Historiographical Commentray on Book Two of Tacitus' Histories
abstractText: I intend to complete the commentary of Tacitus Histories Book Two. This will provide readers with a comprehensive framework for exploring a range of complex literary, textual and historical issues. The commentary will thus enhance the understanding and enjoyment of one of the most central and engaged text of the Roman Historical tradition and in intended both for students and scholars of Latin text alike.
